about_the_game:
As a missionary, you go to spread your message to a wicked man. He, however, wants to play a card game with you.

HOW ABOUT WE PLAY A GAME?

A Psychological Horror Card Game!

Immerse yourself in a haunting PSX-style retro world, or will it consume you?

Features:

  • Exprimental and Psychological: A fresh take on psychological horror Cardgame.

  • Intense Card Battles: Rely on luck and strategy to barely survive fierce battles and acquire new cards to beat the Wicked Man's game.

  • Short & Perfect for a Weekend: Designed to be completed in a weekend, offering a concise yet impactful experience.

  • Deckbuilding Mechanics: Customize your deck to suit your playstyle.

  • Multilingual Support: Enjoy the game in your preferred language with subtitle support for 15 different languages.

  • Atmospheric Horror: Immerse yourself in a chilling horror atmosphere with visuals and a hauntingly beautiful soundtrack.

  • Story-Rich Experience: Dive into a captivating narrative that unfolds as you progress, with intriguing characters.

  • High Replayability: Challenge yourself endlessly in Unlimited Mode, offering fresh runs and limitless card battles.

  • Steam Leaderboards: Compete with players worldwide and see how your scores rank on the Steam leaderboards.

  • Full Achievement Support: Unlock a variety of achievements as you master the game, adding extra layers of challenge and reward.

content_descriptors.notes: This game features Strong Language and Violence such as Mutilation and Depictions of Sexual Abuse, depicted solely through dialogue. No sexual acts are visually shown.

short_description: A Short Rogue-like Deckbuilder! As a missionary, you’re forced into a cardgame by a wicked man. He promises if you beat level 13, he'll set you free. Draw as many cards as you like, but if you pull the same color twice, all your cards burn! Obtain SPECIAL CARDS. Build Your Deck. Reach Level 13!
